column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Thank you for your kind review of JINYA. I'm glad you enjoyed the Tonkotsu Black. However
column2: I have spoken to the servers about mishandling the ramen bowls as you have described. I fear this was an instance of rushing service to meet quantity over quality. Please know we are working hard to fix these missteps. Also
column3: please never hesitate to bring these matters to our floor managers' attention. I promise they will make it right for you immediately.
